name: soft-serve
description: Mighty, self-hostable Git server for the command-line

repo.name: soft-serve
repo.description: The mighty, self-hostable Git server for the command line🍦

readme.summary: Excellent README with comprehensive installation and configuration coverage, but lacks troubleshooting guidance for common issues.
readme.top_issue: No troubleshooting section - common problems like SSH connection failures, port conflicts, or permission issues are not documented

injection_risks.description: The UpdateServerInfo function uses the git.NewCommand function to execute a shell command. Although it does not directly use user input, it's still a potential risk if the path variable is not properly sanitized.

The NewRouter function uses the mux.NewRouter function to create an HTTP router. The router does not seem to be directly vulnerable to injection attacks, but it's still important to ensure that any user input is properly sanitized.

critical_findings: Potential injection risk in the UpdateServerInfo function of git/server.go
Lack of input validation in the UpdateServerInfo function of git/server.go
security.summary: The code has some potential security risks, including a possible injection attack vector and lack of input validation, but overall it seems to be well-structured and secure.

common_complaints: Performance issues with large repository mirroring (CPU pegging)
LFS upload failures with locking errors
praise_themes: Feature requests are collaborative and constructive
sentiment.summary: Active community with moderate maintainer engagement; users report real performance and functionality gaps but maintain positive sentiment toward the project.

communication.summary: The maintainer responses are generally adequate but could be more helpful and clear, especially for less technical users.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being today (2026-01-26)
66 open issues with no recent activity
No closed issues in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests lack of versioning/releases
positive_signals: Repository still exists and has not been deleted
maintenance.summary: soft-serve appears abandoned with no maintenance activity over the past 6 months despite a suspicious same-day commit timestamp that may indicate stale data.

project_metrics.description: The mighty, self-hostable Git server for the command line🍦
